Name: Bocce VR
About the game: The game of bowls is a very old sport, which requires skill, strategy and a little luck. Bocce VR allows you to experience the excitement of a large game of bowling, challenging the computer. Play inside the stadium of a real bocce club, the atmosphere and tension will be skyrocketing. Show that you master this sport with cunning and skill, decide which strategies you use in the game to defeat your opponent. Features Simple and good look Realistic and interacting audience Good and funny music
